# Change Log

## v0.3.0 - February 21, 2019

### Rules Removed
- `no-unused-variable` - Deprecated, see palantir/tslint#4046 for more
  information.

## v0.2.0 - July 08, 2018

### Rules Added
- `ter-no-proto`
- `ter-no-script-url`
- `ter-no-self-compare`
- `ter-no-tabs`
- `ter-padded-blocks`

### Rules Fixed
- `cyclomatic-complexity` is now `false`
